short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control when your computer goes sleep (turn off the monitor) or awaken. You can postpone your change in some minutes or hours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You may want your computer not to go into "sleeping" mode or do it in some time. All this is possible with the extension - change the mode with one click from "sleeping" to "awaken" or vice versa, make a change in some time (minutes, hours). 
If you forget the current state then no need to open the extension, the icon will be changed automatically every time the status is updated.
